forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 9C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 48F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 2C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 36F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High near 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High near 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early will give way to a mixture of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 41F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly clear after midnight. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then clearing later on. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 0C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 33F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening changing to a mix of steady rain and freezing rain overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening changing to a mix of steady rain and freezing rain overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain tapering to showers. Areas of freezing rain early. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain tapering to showers. Areas of freezing rain early. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later in the day. High near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.
